Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension EXL High-Sensitivity Troponin I (TNIH) Assay
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Dimension EXL integrated chemistry system with LOCI module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension EXL High-Sensitivity Troponin I (TNIH) Assay measuring cardiac troponin I using chemiluminescent immunoassay on Dimension EXL system
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic quantitative measurement of cardiac troponin I in human plasma to aid in the diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction (AMI)
